name: n8n-nodes-base.microsoftEntraTool
semantic_context: Interact with Microsoft Entra ID API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Interact with Microsoft Entra ID API
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Add to Group
options.description: Add user to group

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a user

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a user

options.name: Get
options.description: Retrieve data for a specific user

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Retrieve a list of users

options.name: Remove from Group
options.description: Remove user from group

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a user

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

groupType.name: groupType
groupType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

displayName.name: displayName
displayName.description: The name to display in the address book for the user
displayName.ai_hint: The name to display in the address book for the user

mailNickname.name: mailNickname
mailNickname.description: The mail alias for the user
mailNickname.ai_hint: The mail alias for the user

membershipType.name: membershipType

options.name: Assigned
options.description: Lets you add specific users as members of a group and have unique permissions

options.name: Dynamic
options.description: Lets you use rules to automatically add and remove users as members

membershipType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

securityEnabled.name: securityEnabled
securityEnabled.description: Whether the group is a security group

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: aboutMe
options.description: A freeform text entry field for the user to describe themselves

options.name: ageGroup
options.description: Sets the age group of the user

options.name: birthday
options.description: The birthday of the user

options.name: businessPhones
options.description: The telephone number for the user

options.name: city
options.description: The city in which the user is located

options.name: companyName
options.description: The name of the company associated with the user

options.name: consentProvidedForMinor
options.description: Specifies if consent is provided for minors

options.name: country
options.description: The country/region of the user

options.name: department
options.description: The department name where the user works

options.name: employeeId
options.description: Employee identifier assigned by the organization

options.name: employeeType
options.description: Defines enterprise worker type

options.name: employeeHireDate
options.description: The hire date of the user

options.name: employeeLeaveDateTime
options.description: The date and time when the user left or will leave the organization

options.name: employeeOrgData
options.description: Represents organization data (for example, division and costCenter) associated with a user

values.name: costCenter
values.description: The cost center associated with the user

values.name: division
values.description: The name of the division in which the user works

options.name: givenName
options.description: The given name (first name) of the user

options.name: forceChangePassword
options.description: Whether the user must change their password on the next sign-in

options.name: interests
options.description: A list for the user to describe their interests

options.name: jobTitle
options.description: The user's job title

options.name: surname
options.description: The user's last name (family name)

options.name: mail
options.description: The SMTP address for the user

options.name: mobilePhone
options.description: The primary cellular telephone number for the user

options.name: mySite
options.description: The URL for the user's personal site

options.name: officeLocation
options.description: The office location for the user

options.name: onPremisesImmutableId
options.description: This property is used to associate an on-premises Active Directory user account to their Microsoft Entra user object

options.name: otherMails
options.description: Additional email addresses for the user

options.name: passwordPolicies
options.description: Specifies password policies

options.name: pastProjects
options.description: A list of past projects the user has worked on

options.name: postalCode
options.description: The postal code for the user's address

options.name: preferredLanguage
options.description: User's preferred language in ISO 639-1 code

options.name: responsibilities
options.description: A list of responsibilities the user has

options.name: schools
options.description: A list of schools the user attended

options.name: skills
options.description: A list of skills the user possesses

options.name: state
options.description: The state or province of the user's address

options.name: streetAddress
options.description: The street address of the user's place of business

options.name: usageLocation
options.description: Two-letter country code where the user is located

options.name: userType
options.description: Classifies the user type

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

requestOptions.name: requestOptions

values.name: batchSize
values.description: Input will be split in batches to throttle requests. -1 for disabled. 0 will be treated as 1.

values.name: batchInterval
values.description: Time (in milliseconds) between each batch of requests. 0 for disabled.

options.name: allowUnauthorizedCerts
options.description: Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible

options.name: proxy
options.description: HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128

options.name: timeout
options.description: Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request

requestOptions.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'group' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'groupType'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'displayName'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'mailNickname'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'create' AND groupType == 'Unified' THEN SHOW parameter 'mailEnabled'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'membershipType'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'create' AND groupType == 'Unified' THEN SHOW parameter 'securityEnabled'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF /membershipType == 'DynamicMembership' THEN HIDE parameter 'isAssignableToRole'
IF /membershipType == 'DynamicMembership' THEN SHOW parameter 'membershipRule'
IF /membershipType == 'DynamicMembership' THEN SHOW parameter 'membershipRuleProcessingState'
IF /groupType == 'Unified' THEN SHOW parameter 'preferredDataLocation'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'group'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'group'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'output'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'get' AND output == 'fields' THEN SHOW parameter 'fields'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filter'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'output'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'getAll' AND output == 'fields' THEN SHOW parameter 'fields'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'group'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'addGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'group'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'addGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'user'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'accountEnabled'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'displayName'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'userPrincipalName'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'mailNickname'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'password'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'user'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'user'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'output'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'get' AND output == 'fields' THEN SHOW parameter 'fields'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filter'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'output'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' AND output == 'fields' THEN SHOW parameter 'fields'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'removeGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'group'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'removeGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'user'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'user'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
